resources.string: We collect scrap from wide list of item like Newspaper, Plastic, Iron, Electronic machine,etc. We do not pick up cloth and glass
Choose a date for scrap pickup
Choose a date when you want our executives to come for scrap pickup.
Pickup Executives Will arrive at your home/ office
Our pickup executives will call you 1 hour before coming. They will bring an electronic machine to weight each scrap item separately.
